name: metalliferous hydroxide sludge to market for zinc concentrate | zinc concentrate | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/18093/documentation

This dataset is a proxy datasets which connects the "metaliferous hydroxide sludge to the market for zinc concentrate. This dataset should be replaced by the Waelz process which would be the appropriate method for zinc recovery from the metalliferous hydroxide sludge. ;The metalliferous hydroxide sludge is produced as a by-product of incineration of different types of waste in incinerators which include the FLUWA process - filter and fly ash washing (https://www.bsh.ch/en/waste-to-energy-plants/fluwa-process/) which removes this zinc rich metalliferous hydroxide sludge.;;This sludge with its high concentrations of zinc is then sent as a secondary feedstock to the zinc smelting industry. 

This activity starts by the metalliferous hydroxide sludge being produced in the FLUWA process. 

This datasets end by a zinc concentrate being produced.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/382:Waste treatment and disposal/3821:Treatment and disposal of non-hazardous waste

exchanges.description: Calculated value from the knowledge of the properties of both products.
